Title: A new kind of developer is emerging on GitHub
Author: GitHub
Description:
A new kind of developer is emerging. Eirini Kalliamvakou shares how 80% of new developers on GitHub are using Copilot within their first week. This shift isn't just about tools; it's about building "AI fluency" and the judgment to understand exactly what AI can and cannot do.

#AI #GitHubCopilot #Developer
